casebody.data:
A. L. WILLIS et al., Appellants, v. BARNS-DALL OIL COMPANY et al., Appellees. No. 12525. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. May 6, 1949. Rehearing Denied May 30, 1949. Robert S. Vance, of Texarkana, Tex., for appellants. Richard L. Arnold, of Texarkana, Ark., and Foster V. Phipps, of Tulsa, Okl., for appellees.

Before HUTCHESON, SIBLEY, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed for the reasons set out by the District Judge in his opinion, reported in 78 F.Supp, 293.

Affirmed.
